sentences.en: After incision, on the cross section also can have redfiliform.
sentences.cn: 切开之后, 断面上还会有红色的丝状物.

sentences.en: It occurs in the laceration and contusion as well as in the clean surgical incision.
sentences.cn: 撕裂伤,挫伤和外科清洁切口,都会发生这种现象.

sentences.en: Make a large anterolateral midaxillary incision in the fifth intercostal space.
sentences.cn: 在腋中前面偏一点的位置尽量大的切开直至第五条动脉间的空隙.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the clinical effect of abdominal hysterectomy with Joel Cohen incision.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨JoelCohen切口子宫切除术的临床价值.

sentences.en: Results Operative incision of 78 cases were primary healing.
sentences.cn: 结果78例患者手术切口均一期愈合.

sentences.en: Sterile surgical blade is the necessary material for surgical incision.
sentences.cn: 消毒的外科手术刀对于外科手术来说是必须的.

sentences.en: The incision on my leg smarts.
sentences.cn: 我腿上手术的伤口会痛.

sentences.en: The laparoscope is then inserted through an incision in the navel.
sentences.cn: 然后腹腔镜通过脐部小切口插入.

sentences.en: The muscle and fascial layers are incised lateral to a rectus incision.
sentences.cn: 在腹直肌切口外侧切开肌肉和筋膜层.

sentences.en: The new plastic incise drape could reduce incision and inner incision contamination.
sentences.cn: 新型切口保护膜能有效减少切口及切口内的污染.

sentences.en: The nurse quickly sponged off the blood round the incision.
sentences.cn: 护士迅速把刀口周围的血用海绵吸掉.

sentences.en: The surgeon closed the incision with stitches.
The surgeon took up my vessel opened by incision with great skill.
sentences.cn: 外科医生用非常高明的手术扎紧了我那被切开的血管.

sentences.en: The technique involves making a tiny incision in the skin.
sentences.cn: 该技术需要在皮肤上切个小口。

sentences.en: Through this incision, the abdominal cavity is distended with carbon dioxide gas.
sentences.cn: 二氧化碳气体通过这个切口进入，造成腹腔肿胀。

sentences.en: Yes. You have to examine incision for any unusual symptoms every day.
sentences.cn: 有,你必须每天检查手术伤口是否有不正常的症状.

words.tran_cn: 雕刻的；切入的；有锯齿状边缘的
切口；雕刻，切割；[外科]切开

trans.tran_en: a neat cut made into something, especially during a medical operation
